name: Choo-Choo Cart Rest Stop
description: A sight seen only in the Veluriyam Mirage, it appears to be part of a train platform. As Choo-Choo Carts pass beneath them, the designers originally planned to have booths offering comfy chairs along with food and drink next to them. However, while the former might be beneficial to riders who found the ride too exciting, the latter proved impractical due to the steep slopes and sudden turns...
